Find the angles of triangle ABC. [asy] import graph; size(9.115122858763474cm); real labelscalefactor = 0.5; /* changes label-to-point distance */ pen dps = linewidth(0.7) + fontsize(10); defaultpen(dps); /* default pen style */ pen dotstyle = black; /* point style */ real xmin = -7.9216637359954705, xmax = 10.308581981531479, ymin = -6.062398124651168, ymax = 9.377503860601273; /* image dimensions */ /* draw figures */ draw((1.1862495478417192,2.0592342833377844)--(3.0842,-3.6348), linewidth(1.6)); draw((2.412546402365528,-0.6953452852662508)--(1.8579031454761883,-0.8802204313959623), linewidth(1.6)); draw((-3.696094000229639,5.5502174997511595)--(1.1862495478417192,2.0592342833377844), linewidth(1.6));
